game.name: Lost Gods: Adventures of K&K
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 자막 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A classic point-and-click adventure featuring a blue-haired alien and a loyal white dog. Travel across strange planets, solve puzzles, and explore mysterious locations in a search for the ancient Lost Gods.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A classic point-and-click adventure featuring a blue-haired alien and a loyal white dog. Travel across strange planets, solve puzzles, and explore mysterious locations in a search for the ancient Lost Gods.
